resources.string: Welcome to Publist, to add public checklist you need to be a guest or a signed user..
Choose some interests to personalize your wish lists
You can select at most %1$d categories
You can select at most one category
Enable permissions from settings to proceed
You have to make at least %1$d items
Are you sure you want to logout?
Are you sure you want to delete this wish?
You already have checked items in this wish , are you sure?
You are unregistered , you need to login first
Get the latest list you are interested in
Create your own list and share it with others
Complete , like or check the most important items
Customize your interests and follow up categories

Welcome to Publist! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Publist\'s Mobile App \n By accessing this application we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Publist if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page. \n The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: \"Client\", \"You\" and \"Your\" refers to you, the person log on this application and compliant to the Company’s terms and conditions. \"The Company\", \"Ourselves\", \"We\", \"Our\" and \"Us\", refers to our Company. \"Party\", \"Parties\", or \"Us\", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client’s needs in respect of provision of the Company’s stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Netherlands. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same.

Unless otherwise stated, Publist and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on Publist. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from Publist for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.

Parts of this application offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the application. Publist does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the application. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Publist,its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, Publist shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this application. \n Publist reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions
